attributes.name: VALORANT Champions Tour 2025
attributes.rules:
## Tournament Rules

### General Rules
1. All participants must be registered with verified accounts
2. Teams must consist of exactly 5 players + 1 substitute
3. All matches will be played on the latest patch
4. Use of any third-party software is strictly prohibited

### Match Format
- **Round Robin:** Best of 1 (BO1)
- **Playoffs:** Best of 3 (BO3)
- **Finals:** Best of 5 (BO5)

### Prize Distribution
- 1st Place: $400,000
- 2nd Place: $200,000
- 3rd-4th Place: $100,000 each
- 5th-8th Place: $50,000 each
